text:
So sorry for the late reply, I’m finally back from visiting family now :+1::skin-tone-3: Yeah I’m not really into animation or programming but I know the basics of animation and rigging. I think programming would give me a big advantage but I wouldn’t know where to start with it at all. 
Over the summer I really want to work on my env general pipeline skills, maybe by building a scene from scratch. I’ve done this a couple of times before but have always been constrained by university deadlines. 

It’s awesome to hear you’ve worked on cinematics too. I’ve spent a bit of time with Hugo Guerra who is really well known for his cinematics now and because I’m interested in games I think I’d like to work on cinematics/trailers!
